revision.text: {| ! style="background:{{Mega Stones color light}}; color:#FFFFFF" | [[Bag|Items pocket]] color light: |'''linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,0,0,0.6) 0%, rgba(255,154,0,0.6) 10%, rgba(208,222,33,0.6) 20%, rgba(79,220,74,0.6) 30%, rgba(63,218,216,0.6) 40%, rgba(47,201,226,0.6) 50%, rgba(28,127,238,0.6) 60%, rgba(95,21,242,0.6) 70%, rgba(186,12,248,0.6) 80%, rgba(251,7,217,0.6) 90%, rgba(255,0,0,0.6) 100%)''' |}[[Category:Bag color templates|Items]]
